member.name: M:WeightLossTracker.Api.Controllers.DietTrackerController.PartiallyUpdateDietEntryForMember(System.String,System.Int32,Microsoft.AspNetCore.JsonPatch.JsonPatchDocument)
member.param: the id of the diet entry you want to update
the set of operations to apply to the diet entry
member.remarks: Sample request this request updates the portion size of the food PATCH /members/{memberId}/dietTracker/{id}\ [\ {\ "op":"replace",\ "path":"/PortionSize"\ "value":1\ }\ ]

member.name: M:WeightLossTracker.Api.Controllers.MembersController.Login(WeightLossTrackerData.DTOs.Content.UserDto)
